name: Get DataControl module status
description: Retrieves a count of files and devices that Data Control identified with each type of Personally Identifiable Information (PII).

counter_id.description:
Type of data control counter.
- 0: Files with unknown Personally Identifiable Information (PII)
- 1: Files that contain personal ID card numbers
- 2: Files that contain passport numbers
- 3: Files that contain credit card numbers
- 4: Files that contain bank account numbers
- 5: Files that contain driver's license numbers
- 6: Files that contain social security numbers
- 7: Files that contain email addresses
- 9: Files that contain IP addresses
- 10: Files that contain first names and last names
- 11: Files that contain postal addresses and ZIP or postal code
- 13: Files that contain phone numbers
- 2000: Total files with Personably Identifiable Information (PII)

number_of_devices.description: Number of devices with personal data.

number_of_files.description: Number of files with personal data.
